attributes.action: Ban the game 'Gal*Gun' in the UK! Follow the lead of Australia and New Zealand!
attributes.additional_details:
It is possible to purchase Gal Gun in the U.K. from most gaming platforms, including Steam and PS4. It is also sold on Amazon.co.uk and in many independent retailers. 

One of the options in the game is to select the personality type 'pervert'.

The girls are forced into positions of a sexual nature and their expressions are often depicted to be distressed.

The game currently has an age rating of 16. I believe this game should be banned as it endorses paedophilia.
attributes.background: In Gal Gun, players exploit young school children for sexual purposes and also use force to compel the young anime school girls to agree to sexual advances. It deals entirely with making sexual advances on young children. Gal Gun is banned in Australia and New Zealand have recently followed suit.

rejection.details:
The issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. Banning specific video games is a matter for the Video Standards Council, not the Government. For more on the Video Standards Council, including details of how to get in touch, see the links below:

http://videostandards.org.uk/Home/

https://www.gov.uk/government/news/new-rules-to-better-protect-children-from-inappropriate-video-game-content
